title: GREAT COMMUNITY FOR EVERYONE!!! $500 OFF FIRST MONTH RENT
posting_body: ['PARK 80 APARTMENTS OFFERING $500.00 OFF YOUR MOVE IN!!(ON APPROVED CREDIT)', 'STUDIOS UPSTAIRS $950.00 DOWNSTAIRS $960.00+$5 PEST FEE', '1X1 UPSTAIRS $,1075.00 DOWNSTAIRS $1,1075 +$5 PEST FEE', '2X1 UPSTAIRS $1,130 DOWNSTAIRS $1,140 +5 PEST FEE', '2X2', 'UPSTAIRS $1,230 DOWNSTAIRS $1240 +$5 PEST FEE', '3X2 UPSTAIRS $1,340 DOWNSTAIRS $1,350 +$5 PEST FEE', "POOL, BBQ'S, GYM, PLAYGROUND SOCCAR FEILD, 4 LAUNDRY FACILITIES", 'GATED COMMUNITY, SECURITY PATROL, 24 HOUR MAINTANCE', 'ALL APARTMENT HOMES ARE RENOVATED', "ALL ELECTRIC APLIANCES INCLUDED, PATIO'S", '$45 APPLICATION FEE 18 AND OVER $100 HOLDING DEPOSIT', 'QUALIFICATIONS ARE: 3XS RENT, NO EVICTIONS AND NO FELONIES', '$500.00 DEPOSIT UPON APPROVED CREDIT/ OR 1 MONTH RENT DEPOSIT', '25 LB PET RESTRICTION $300 NON REFUNDABLE PET DEPOSIT', 'EASILY APPLY AT PARK80VEGAS.COM', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
